metadata.synopsis: When players pick the Coin of Mammon or the Infernal Marble before knowing that Helsik is a Diabolist, they will know that the "curio shop" is more than they thought. This will unlock the option to ask Helsik about the hellish items.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make click on S_LOW_DevilsFee_InfernalMarble_c8e18f16-4377-4e51-9790-fbff74510814 or S_LOW_DevilsFee_CoinOfMammon_8378143d-07de-4fca-881a-cb9791ac2f1c before the flag LOW_DevilsFee_Know_NoticeHellishItems_b0cfc46c-4730-26f1-f3a2-a6d7147a5e58 is set.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Hm. What sort of 'curio shop' has authentic infernal objects?
